name: Pong 2D (LittleBagon)
description:
My very first complete game using Unity. Very simple and it has a cool little Easter egg. Hint: It's in the options menu.

Controls

---- Single player---- WASD and Arrow keys. ----Two Players---- Player1 WASD, Player2 Arrow keys. 

Any feedback is appreciated.  :)

I made this game following this tutorial, but made a few changes using the skills I learned while making the game.
